column4: hi people, what is more secure way to set up an subversion server? Inetd or an script that initialize it on booting time?
i use subversion and apache2 with the subversion-module
man, i will use lighttpd and I know that there is a way to do something like it with lighttpd
i'm running a dedicated apache2 install somewhere to server subversion repo's, just because the svn people made a apache-module like http://packages.debian.org/stable/net/libapache2-svn
